title: Bad Echo sprite sheet JSON schema

textureFormat.description: The image format of the texture containing the individual sprite sheet frames, identified here using the format's associated file extension.

rows.description: The number of rows of frames in the sprite sheet.

columns.description: The number of columns of frames in the sprite sheet.

rowUp.description: The starting row for upward movement.

rowDown.description: The starting row for downward movement.

rowLeft.description: The starting row for leftward movement.

rowRight.description: The starting row for rightward movement.
